name: Funny Bird Game 2
description:
KIM ROYAL Presents Funny Bird Game 2 is an original Gameboy Advance game written by me in about a week or so. The gameplay is pretty simple - more or less a clone of Flappy Bird - but I hope that it might inspire anyone who sees it to go check out Tonc and devkitPro and perhaps go out there to make their own Gameboy Advance game!

I will be going into detail over on my blog in the next few weeks on how I made the game (including some actual examples because finding any concrete examples of some of the things I wanted to do online is a NIGHTMARE), my thoughts and feelings on it, and what I plan to do in the future. I will also likely put the music up at some point, either on my Bandcamp, or on my Soundcloud.

FEATURES:
-Background Parallaxing
-A score counter
-TWO entire songs, composed by me in OpenMPT!
-An animated player sprite, complete with rotation like the original Flappy Bird!
-Might work on a real GBA! I haven't tested yet due to the ongoing quarantine!
